channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The travel credit card that opens the door to luxury Hyatt stays around the world
item.description: The World of Hyatt Credit Card can unlock luxury stays around the world. Here's why you may want one in your wallet.

item.title: I asked TPG staffers how they manage credit card statement credits â€” here are 4 tips
item.description: If you carry premium credit cards with high annual fees, you know how important it is to maximize statement credits. Here are tips to stay organized.

item.title: How to transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards points to British Airways Club
item.description: How to transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards points to British Airways Club to book flights, including airline partner award tickets.

item.title: What it was like on Amtrak's new Acela 'NexGen' trains
item.description: We tested out first and business-class on Amtrak's new NextGen train.

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred vs. Amex Gold: Which mid-tier favorite is right for you?
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred and Amex Gold are two of the top travel credit cards. We put them head to head so you can pick which is better for you.
